mapper.select: SELECT T.ORDER_NAME, T.ORDER_DESC, T.PAYER_IS_PLATFORM_CUST, T.PAYER_CUST_ID, T.PAYER_ACCT_TYPE, T.PAYER_ACCT_ID, T.PAYER_CUST_NAME, T.PAYEE_IS_PLATFORM_CUST, T.PAYEE_CUST_ID, T.PAYEE_ACCT_TYPE, T.PAYEE_ACCT_ID, T.PAYEE_CUST_NAME, T.SUM_AMT, T.CURR_CODE, T.CORE_SN, CASE WHEN T.TRADE_TYPE ='1301' THEN 'RED_PACKET_PAYMENT' WHEN T.IS_NEED_CHARGE ='0' THEN 'BALANCE_PAYMENT' WHEN T.IS_NEED_CHARGE ='1' THEN 'BANK_CARD_PAYMENT' END TRADE_TYPE, T.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_TIME FROM TD_TRADE_BILL_MAIN T, TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO LU, TD_CUST_INFO U WHERE T.PAYER_CUST_ID=LU.CUST_ID AND T.PAYEE_CUST_ID = U.CUST_ID AND T.TRADE_TYPE IN ('1101','1301') AND T.ORDER_STATE = '00' AND T.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT T.ORDER_ID, T.CORE_SN, T.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_TIME, T.SUM_AMT, T.PAYER_CUST_ID, T.PAYER_ACCT_ID FROM TD_TRADE_BILL_MAIN T WHERE T.TRADE_TYPE = '1301' AND T.ORDER_STATE = '00' AND T.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
